text:
@IvankaTrump Vanky's "unforgivable sin was bringing in Jared Kushner as a top Trump adviser. Fresh from his performance in bringing peace to the Middle East, Jared is now floundering around as a coordinator of the White House coronavirus response."
https://t.co/eQGcPVI1Qy
